column2:
"Thank you, <%me>. I can
always count on you to accept my requests."

"It appears these microminerals may be related
to the electrical discharge you observed before."
"The phenomenon of those microminerals sometimes furling up into the atmosphere can be confirmed, but have you seen it?"

"That's what I want you to observe. Please collect
as much data as you can."

"I hate to bother you again, but I'll be looking
forward to your findings. Thank you."
